pullRequest.title: [core] Add more bindings for the designer
pullRequest.bodyText:
Refs pmd/pmd-designer#33
This will be published in 6.23.0 and used by the designer for its 6.24.0 version (it's not urgent)

getMainAttribute breaks the dependency on Node::getImage, which gives a clear alternative for when this attribute is deprecated/removed
getAdditionalInfo breaks the dependency on reflection to display the type of a node, and more things may be displayed this way in the future (eg results of XPath functions)
getIcon is something that may improve readability in the treeview, not yet implemented at all in the designer.

commit.message: Add bindings for the designer treeview

nodes.bodyText: I'd just name the field "sortKey" / getSortKey().
